name: Scarlet Witch

abilities.name: Hex Bolt
abilities.details: Fires bolts of chaos magic that seek targets and may apply a random minor debuff (e.g., brief slow, damage amp).

abilities.name: Reality Warp
abilities.details: Alters reality in a small area, potentially creating hazardous terrain or applying a stronger debuff (e.g., silence, disarm).

abilities.name: Chaos Shield
abilities.details: Creates a protective shield of chaotic energy (~400 HP?) that may reflect some projectiles erratically.

ultimate.name: No More...
ultimate.effect: Unleashes immense chaos magic, damaging enemies and preventing them from using non-primary fire abilities for ~4 seconds.
ultimate.details: A devastating reality-altering ultimate that disrupts enemy teams significantly.

passives.name: Probability Manipulation
passives.details: Grants nearby allies a small chance to ignore minor damage instances. Causes enemies near Wanda to have a small chance for abilities to briefly malfunction (increased cooldown trigger?).

teamups.effect: Chaos Shield reflects projectiles more reliably when near specified allies.

lore: Wanda Maximoff, a mutant (or magic user, depending on continuity) with the ability to manipulate probability and reality itself through chaos magic. Her immense power is often unstable.

comics.title: The Vision and the Scarlet Witch
